constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 91 (Tuesday, May 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BEYER:
H.R. 3474.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution,
[[Page H2667]]
[Page H2666]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Keeping All Students Safe Act
